alert.note: Alert for Cullman (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:38PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Cullman County through 345 PM CDT... At 238 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blountsville to near Curry. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hanceville, Good Hope, Holly Pond, Dodge City, Garden City, Colony, Walter, Wilburn, Bremen and Arkadelphia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
